description: Navigate a multi-story mansion as a police mouse to retrieve stolen goods while avoiding agile cats.
rationale: This game focuses on pathfinding, timing, and strategic movement within a platformer environment. It is targeted at fans of classic arcade maze games and provides a complex environment for RL agents to learn optimal routing and hazard avoidance.
details: The game is a 2D side-scrolling platformer with multiple floors connected by trampolines. The player controls a mouse (Mappy). Objective: Collect all items (stolen goods) scattered across the floors. Hazard: Cats (Meowkies) roam the mansion. Touching a cat on the floor results in a lost life. Trampolines: Jumping on a trampoline allows access to different floors; however, jumping more than three times consecutively without landing on a floor causes the trampoline to break. Doors: Mappy can open/close doors to stun cats or create barriers. Physics: Gravity-based jumping and horizontal movement.

technical_specs.state_space: Player coordinates, enemy coordinates, item locations, trampoline health, door states

how_to_play: Goal: Collect all items to advance to the next level. Controls: Use Left/Right arrow keys to move. Press Space to jump. Mappy bounces automatically on trampolines. Doors auto-toggle when Mappy stands near them. Score: Points are awarded for each item collected (100-500 points). A time bonus is awarded for completing levels quickly. Reward for AI: Positive reward for item collection and level completion, negative reward for cat collision or breaking a trampoline.
